sourcesContent:
export const ProductDetailCard = ({ product }) => { const { category, features, discount, id, image, offerPrice, price, rating, seller, title, } = product; console.log(product); return <>

{title}

{category}

₹{offerPrice} ₹{price}{" "} {discount}

Raings: {rating}

Seller: {seller}

; };
